flawed_nl_solution:
Tyler gives away 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7>>7 CDs
After giving away a third of his CDs, Tyler has 21 - 7 = <<21-7=15>>15 CDs
After buying new CDs, Tyler has 15 + 8 = <<15+8=23>>23 CDs
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
